game.name: Papa’s Pancakeria
game.description:
The Papa franchise is back with Papa Pancakeria! This highly popular time-management series in the form of best cooking game is sure to have you unlimited fun and pleasure while serving pancakes, and waffles and french toast.?

It is time to show your pancake making skills by preparing the best food as per the customer instructions. Fulfilling each order of your customers properly would help you to receive some tips. There are also chances of receiving lower tips in case of overcooking and sloppily stacking items. You can use your hard-earned tips to purchase upgrades and play mini-games for prizes.?

You are in charge of Papa Pancakeria shop in this cooking game, so help Papa Louie do the job in the optimum possible way! Your primary job is to take orders from the customers who come at the outlet, then prepare them properly at the grill station. Remember your customers are very choosy about the toppings they desire, hence do not make a mistake and try to serve their products with the appropriate order and quantities. Very soon you will find yourself a pancake expert after playing this flash game in your browser.?

Thus, roll up your sleeves to take all the orders of pancakes, waffles, and french toast perfectly. Since your newest friend, The Great Foodini, is waiting for you with some crazy mini-games to play once you finish all the tasks of the day properly. Foodini will only accept special tickets that you will earn throughout the day. You would get a chance to win plenty of unique and amazing prices with each ticket you obtain to play his daily game.
